title: Carrara Marble Countertop - 120x60cm
description: This Carrara marble countertop is a beautiful and durable option for your kitchen or bathroom. It is made from high-quality marble that is known for its elegant white color and striking veining. The countertop is also easy to care for and maintain.

title: Silestone Quartz Countertop - 120x60cm
description: This Silestone quartz countertop is a beautiful and durable option for your kitchen or bathroom. It is made from high-quality quartz that is known for its strength and resistance to stains and scratches. The countertop is also easy to care for and maintain.

title: Granite Countertop - 120x60cm
description: This granite countertop is a durable and stylish choice for your kitchen or bathroom. It features a natural stone pattern that adds elegance to any space. The countertop is resistant to heat, scratches, and stains, making it ideal for daily use.

title: Quartzite Countertop - 120x60cm
description: This quartzite countertop offers the perfect combination of beauty and durability. It is formed from natural quartzite stone, which is known for its unique patterns and colors. The countertop is resistant to heat, scratches, and stains, making it a great choice for busy kitchens.

title: Marble Vanity Top - 60x40cm
description: Enhance your bathroom with this exquisite marble vanity top. The compact size of 60x40cm makes it a perfect fit for smaller spaces. The marble surface adds a touch of luxury, while the polished finish provides an elegant look.

title: Quartz Kitchen Sink - Single Bowl
description: Upgrade your kitchen with this high-quality quartz kitchen sink. The single bowl design offers ample space for all your dishwashing needs. The quartz material is durable and resistant to stains, scratches, and heat.

title: Granite Backsplash - 60x10cm
description: Complete the look of your kitchen or bathroom with this granite backsplash. The 60x10cm size is perfect for adding a stylish and functional element to your space. The granite material is resistant to moisture, heat, and stains.

title: Marble Fireplace Surround - White
description: Create a stunning focal point in your living room with this marble fireplace surround. The white marble adds elegance and sophistication to any fireplace. The surround is easy to install and maintain, making it a perfect choice for cozy evenings.

title: Quartz Bathroom Vanity - 80x50cm
description: Upgrade your bathroom with this stylish quartz bathroom vanity. The 80x50cm size provides ample storage space for your essentials. The quartz material is durable and resistant to moisture, making it perfect for bathroom use.

title: Marble Dining Table - Round
description: Add a touch of luxury to your dining area with this exquisite marble dining table. The round shape creates an intimate and stylish setting. The marble top is durable and easy to clean, making it perfect for everyday use.
